content: Once you take off half his health bar, things will get real messy fast. Zhu Bajie will go back to his roots, in a sense, and transform into a giant boar that just can't wait to roll around in the mud with you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Zhu Bajie (Second Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Once you take off half his health bar, things will get real messy fast. Zhu Bajie will go back to his roots, in a sense, and transform into a giant boar that just can't wait to roll around in the mud with you.
